name: manic monster
description:
This is work in progress and my first game!!  I will add improved animations, baddies, power ups and levels soon and try to figure out a persistent leaderboard of best performers.  The is a 'feature' request my son had was not to reset the score on your death so there you go, you can die multiple times and still collect the same coins. 

Mister needs to get home but the baddies are out to get him.  Can he have it all and collect the booty and save himself in time for tea?

My son designed the main character sprite and the baddies.  The music and assets I got from the internet but I forget who made those.  Let me know if you need a credit.
